ECEN 214.question: How do I measure the output of an op-amp circuit in the lab?
ECEN 214.answer: Connect the oscilloscope probe across the output terminal and ground. Make sure to use the correct probe attenuation (typically 10x) and verify the circuit has proper DC biasing.

ECEN 214.question: What is the purpose of a feedback resistor in an amplifier?
ECEN 214.answer: The feedback resistor controls the gain and stability of the amplifier. It determines the closed-loop gain when used with an input resistor in op-amp configurations.

ECEN 214.question: How do I correctly use the Analog Discovery 2 to measure voltage and current?
ECEN 214.answer: Connect the Wavegen or Scope channels to the circuit following the Digilent reference guide. Always ensure the reference ground is shared with the circuit.

ECEN 248.question: How do I debug Verilog code that doesn't simulate correctly?
ECEN 248.answer: Start by checking signal assignments, ensure blocking (`=`) vs non-blocking (`<=`) usage is correct, and verify your testbench applies correct inputs over time.

ECEN 248.question: What is the difference between blocking and non-blocking assignments in Verilog?
ECEN 248.answer: Blocking assignments execute sequentially (`=`), while non-blocking (`<=`) execute concurrently. Always use non-blocking in clocked always blocks.

ECEN 248.question: How do I program the FPGA board used in ECEN 248 labs?
ECEN 248.answer: After simulation, generate the bitstream in Vivado and use the Hardware Manager to connect to the FPGA board via USB-JTAG and program it.

Equipment Troubleshooting.question: Why is the power supply not outputting voltage?
Equipment Troubleshooting.answer: 1. First ensure that the voltage supply button is lit up (turned on). 2. Check your probes by connecting the tips of the ground and power to the tips of the multimeter to ensure the probes are working. You can also connect via breadboard.

Equipment Troubleshooting.question: The oscilloscope is not displaying a waveform â€” what should I check?
Equipment Troubleshooting.answer: Confirm probe connection, vertical scale, time base settings, and that the trigger level is set correctly. Check your probe connection directly using the waveform generator as well as the digital signal probe.

Lab Space Questions.question: How do I make a reservation when I miss a lab/could not finish a lab?
Lab Space Questions.answer: Go to the front desk and scan the QR code for access to make a reservation. Then, you can either make a reservation at one of the front desk kiosks, or scan the QR code to complete the reservation at your own time on your device.

Lab Space Questions.question: Who can I contact about the 3rd floor lab space?
Lab Space Questions.answer: You can contact the Coordinator and request their information from the front desk of the lab space.
